content:
path /v3/ethereum/wallet/priv
operationId EthGenerateAddressPrivateKey
parameters
description Type of Ethereum testnet Defaults to ethereumsepolia
in header
name xtestnettype
required False
schema
default ethereumsepolia
type string
summary Generate Ethereum private key
description 1 credit per API call
Generates the private key of an address from a mnemonic for a given derivation path index The private key is generated for the specific index  each mnemonic
can generate up to 232 private keys starting from index 0 until 231  1
requestBody
PrivKeyRequest
type object
properties
index
description Derivation index of private key to generate
maximum 2147483647
type integer
mnemonic
maxLength 500
minLength 1
description Mnemonic to generate private key from
type string
required
mnemonic
index
required True
responses
200
PrivKey
type object
key
description Generated private key
type string
description OK
